value:
Emm... This was the correct path to
follow, right?

Ah! I'm sorry, did I startle you? It's
surprisingly difficult to gauge my
strength with this armor on...

Ylissean armor symbolizes justice.
If I am to live up to that idea, I must
refrain from any rash behavior.

I will cross oceans and even time
itself for the sake of a peaceful world.
That is why I have this power.

I remember this malevolence... Is the
Fell Dragon here?!

I'm not suited to acting like a king, so
I think I'll accompany you on your
rounds for a while, if that's OK.

Even if a future of despair is all that
awaits us, we will believe in each
other and fight! We will change fate!

I will not let anyone else be lost. That
is what I fight for, and why I must win!

So this is my limit right now... Still,
I won't give up, no matter what!

I will carry the hopes and prayers of
all my friends. I swear it on the holy
name of the Halidom of Ylisse.

I am Chrom, of the Halidom of Ylisse.
It is my duty as the exalt to wield this
power for all those who seek peace!

Oops! I bump into you a lot, don't I?
I'm sorry, but could you spare a bit
of your time while we're here?$k$pIt's just... It's no good. No matter
what I try, I can't seem to sit still.$k$pIt isn't as if I'm hoping for a battle,
but... Well, I think I must be too
accustomed to fighting.$k$pI enjoyed leading the Shepherds and
never intended to become a ruler...
but fate can have unexpected plans.$k$pNo matter the world, life never seems
to go as we expect it to. Still, my
friends and I fought against that.$k$pGuided by the bonds I had formed
with all of them, I vowed to change
our dark futureâ€”to change our fate!$k$pIn truth, I know that prayer alone
cannot prevail against power. But my
heart tells me something else.$k$pPeople's wishes, their pleas for help...
They are never in vain. I will believe
in that for as long as I live.$k$pIf there is a name for that feeling, it
must be justice. I'm sure you have
your own justice that you believe in.$k$pSo, let us each live our lives to the
fullest, to protect those feelings as
we carry them in our hearts.
This should do it!
Believe in me.
Coming through!
How about this?
Is this how it ends?
This is the armor of a Great Lord. It takes a lot of training to earn this, and to wear it well!
*surprise* Don't strike me out of the blue, friend. Even with this armor, it still hurts!
If my power can be used to promote peace, then I will happily go wherever I am needed.
You think Lucina takes after me? I'm not sure what to say...
Another training dummy. Damn. Hope they're not in short supply.
For the good of the people, no matter who or where they are. Isn't that right, Emmeryn?
You called on me. Now it's my turn to live up to that, and do my part.
Message received.
Your orders?
I'll handle this.
